document_data.name: Calishite lamp
document_data.mainbody: A '''Calishite lamp''' was a type of [[lamp]] from [[Calimshan]].
document_data.Description:
Calishite lamps were finely crafted, engraved metal lamps with pointed [[wick]] holders. They typically were used with [[exotic scented lamp oil]]s and could last up to 12 hours with 1 pint (473 ml) of [[oil]]. Lamps of different materials were available for purchase and special order through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

They were also a common choice for [[Genie prison|genie prisons]].
document_data.Reputation: These lamps were popular in many children's stories involving [[genie]]s .
